page.title: 09The Garages
page.content:
In our area there are two garages, one is called the Complex 57 and is on the A57 road towards Lincoln. It is next to Uncle Toms Cabin cafe. Although at some time it used to sell petrol it now only sells and services cars. The road has been straightened at this point and so it is now situated in a lay-by. Apart from the cafe there are only two other houses near the garage.
In Skellingthorpe village there is one garage owned by Mr Dixon who has lived in the village all his life. He started his garage business in 1958 and at one time employed six people but now only employs one. The garage sells second hand cars, petrol, carries out servicing, maintainance and M.O.T. testing.
